Name: Travel The Words
About the game: Twelve carefully crafted immersive word puzzles. Every word in every puzzle has a fun fact that is professionally voice-acted. Players can shuffle the puzzles for replayability and enjoy relaxing ambience and beautiful low-poly artwork. Find bonus words to reveal a hidden mini-game!
